rukus.text: 35|15|salamdeul-iyeo hananim-eul pil-yolo han ideul-i balo neohuideul-ila hana nim-eun pung-yoham-eulo chungmanhasini modeun chanmileul heullo bad-eusoseo
35|16|geubunkkeseo tteus-eul dusil ttae neohui leul myeolmangke hasa saeloun sedaeleul du silini

35|18|jim-eul jilm-eojin jaga dasi daleunsalam-ui jim-eul jilm-eojil su eobs-eumae mu geoun jimjin jaga daleun salam-eul bulleo geuui jim-eul deol-eodalla guhana gajang gakkaun chincheog-ilado jogeumdo deol-eo jul su eobsnola geudaeneun danji boi ji anhneun junim-eul dulyeowo hago aebae haneun geudeul-ege gyeong-gohaneun geos ppun-i la seuseuloleul jeonghwahaneun geos-eun jagi yeonghon-eul wihaeseoil bun choehuui yeojeong eun hananimkkelo ganila
35|19|boji moshan jawa boneun jaga gatji anihamyeo
35|21|seoneulhan geuneulgwa jaglyeolhaneun yeol i gatji anihamyeo
35|22|sal-aissneun geosgwa jug-eun geos-i gatji anhnola sillo hananimkkeseoneun geu bun-ui tteus-i issneun jalo hayeo deudge hasinola
35|23|geudaeneun mudeomsog-e mudhin jaleul deuddolog hal su eobs-eumyeo geudaeneun danjigyeong-gojail ppun-ila
35|24|hananim-eun geudaeleul bog-eum-ui jeon daljawa gyeong-gojalosseo jinliwa hamkke bonaess-eudoe sillo eotteohan baegseong jung-e seodo jeong-gojaga eobs-eossdeon geos-eun ani eossnola
35|25|geudeul-i geudaeleul bujeonghaessdeus-i seonjijadeul-i bunmyeonghan yejeung-gwa sipyeongwabichnaneun seongseoleul gajigo geudeul-ege wass-eul ttae geudeul ijeon-ui seonjodeuldo bujeonghaessnola
35|26|naneun bulsinhan geudeul-eul beolhayeoss nola geudeul-e daehan naui beol-i eolmana museowossdeonyo
